products.title: Daytona, Boutique Cream - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in boutique cream offers a classic cream shade on a durable faux wood that you'd be hard-pressed to tell apart from the real thing. Choose from the traditional full height style, the unique caf style, and the versatile tier on tier style. Surround the boutique cream with soft mauves and lavenders for a relaxing and serene ambience in your master bedroom or even living room. Or, opt for a pretty pastel pink bathroom look, adding rose pinks to the lovely cream of the shutter.

products.title: Splash Oyster Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The splash oyster electric roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately).

products.title: Splash Dove Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light. Their splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites. This splash dove grey electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior.

products.title: Splash Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This cream electric roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This electric roller blind with accompanying white components and cream fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Soft Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Make light work of light control in your home with this electric operated roller blind. The streamlined, simple to use design is a luxurious modern convenience and is not only suitable for any room but is easy to care for too. The cream colourway brings an uplifting touch to the look and is so versatile. Team with pretty pastels or rich classic colours for an eye-catching contrast. products.title: Genesis Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This cream roller blind is ideal for any room in your home due to the neutral tone of the fabric. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows. products.title: Voile Fr Sandshell Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their voile fr fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades. Durable and stylish, this translucent cream electric roller blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream electric roller blind is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. Electric roller blinds are ideal due to their child-safe cordless design, eco-friendly charging options, and can integrate with google home hub and amazon alexa devices, just choose their smart hub when ordering.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Vitra blackout is one of their most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. Revamp your home or office space with a stunning vitra blackout cream roller blind. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach. products.title: Thermoblock Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their exclusive thermoblock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. A cream electric roller blind easily brightens up the space, and their thermoblock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This cream blackout roller has a silver uv-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, a great option for hot offices or sunrooms.
